playn.core

Interface Net.Builder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetImpl.BuilderImpl
    Enclosing interface:
    Net

    public static interface Net.Builder
    Builds a request and allows it to be configured and executed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Net.Builder addHeader(String name, String value)
      Adds the supplied request header.
      void execute(Callback<Net.Response> callback)
      Executes this request, delivering the response via callback.
      Net.Builder setPayload(byte[] payload)
      Configures the payload of this request as raw bytes with content type "application/octet-stream".
      Net.Builder setPayload(byte[] payload, String contentType)
      Configures the payload of this request as raw bytes with the specified content type.
      Net.Builder setPayload(String payload)
      Configures the payload of this request as a UTF-8 string with content type "text/plain".
      Net.Builder setPayload(String payload, String contentType)
      Configures the payload of this request as a UTF-8 string with content type configured as "contentType; charset=UTF-8".

    • Method Detail

      • setPayload

        Net.Builder setPayload(String payload)
        Configures the payload of this request as a UTF-8 string with content type "text/plain". This converts the request to a POST.

      • setPayload

        Net.Builder setPayload(String payload,
                     String contentType)
        Configures the payload of this request as a UTF-8 string with content type configured as "contentType; charset=UTF-8". The supplied content type should probably be something like text/plain or text/xml or application/json. This converts the request to a POST.

      • setPayload

        Net.Builder setPayload(byte[] payload)
        Configures the payload of this request as raw bytes with content type "application/octet-stream". This converts the request to a POST.

      • setPayload

        Net.Builder setPayload(byte[] payload,
                     String contentType)
        Configures the payload of this request as raw bytes with the specified content type. This converts the request to a POST.

      • addHeader

        Net.Builder addHeader(String name,
                    String value)
        Adds the supplied request header.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the header (e.g. Authorization).
        value - the value of the header.

      • execute

        void execute(Callback<Net.Response> callback)
        Executes this request, delivering the response via callback.
